channel.title: CVE Feed for wpchill -- CPO Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpchill -- CPO Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2023-5704|2024-08-02T08:07:32.635Z -- wpchill -- cpo%20shortcodes
item.description: The CPO Shortcodes plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcodes in all versions up to, and including, 1.5.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
